content: resting fox blanket © 2025 afcs crafts all rights reserved please do not sell this pattern feel free to sell any finished product crediting the designer 1 this resting fox blanket was inspired and created for my nephew who i was determined to be associated with a fox excitedly enough his little cries sound exactly like a kit this isn t a beginner s pattern using graphgan/tapestry techniques but if you ve done any advanced colorwork it shouldn t be too difficult i ve worked to include as much detail as possible providing both written and image instructions this pattern has several color changes so to prevent any hair pulling at the end weave in as you go yarn ~ 1275 yards i used loops & threads soft classic but you may use your favorite worsted weight yarn in the following colors green ~250 yards peach ~15 yards dark green ~125 yards brown ~100 yards light green ~150 yards white ~100 yards light blue ~325 yards black ~10 yards orange ~200 yards suggested hooks 5 0 mm h additional items tapestry needle scissors gauge 4 x 4 10cm x 10cm = 14 sts x 10 row in half_double_crochet finished size approximately 40 length x 36 width baby blanket size additional information for help with working on a graphgan pattern you can use the following excellent videos by willow crochet foundation stitches https //www youtube com/watch v=fiug5rkbnfk&t=0s color changes https //www youtube com/watch v=ekbdu-ncsyu&t=126s pattern instructions foundation row directions 1 using the foundation stitch method for half_double_crochet half_double_crochet see additional information create 115 stitches 2 turn chain chain 1 and half_double_crochet in the first stitch the chain 1 is not considered your first stitch 3 half_double_crochet 114 turn chain 1 note if you do not lie the foundation stitch method follow the steps 1 chain 116 2 half_double_crochet in the 2nd stitch from the hook 115 half_double_crochet along chain 3 turn chain 1 and half_double_crochet in the first stitch the chain 1 is not considered your first stitch continue half_double_crochet in the next 114 turn chain 1 © 2025 afcs crafts all rights reserved please do not sell this pattern feel free to sell any finished product crediting the designer 2 pattern directions follow the written instructions or the pattern row 1 39 green 9 orange 23 white 44 green turn chain 1 row 2 45 green 19 white 15 orange 36 green turn chain 1 row 3 34 green 15 orange 20 white 5 green 11 dark green 30 green turn chain 1 row 4 27 green 14 dark green 4 green 2 dark green 20 white 15 orange 4 dark green 29 green turn chain 1 row 5 28 green 4 dark green 18 orange 17 white 3 dark green 3 green 16 dark green 26 green turn chain 1 row 6 23 green 10 dark green 7 white 9 dark green 17 white 18 orange 4 dark green 27 green turn chain 1 row 7 26 green 4
